title: Wildcat!
body: Wildcat! is a game I started working when I decided I wanted to build a game from scratch, mostly as a challenge to myself to see if I could. I also wanted to create my own re-usable game engine from Wilcat!. I wanted to use it as a way to test the engine I was creating and to help make design decisions. That engine goes on to be Elysian, my NPM package that is flexible and usable for many types of games!

title: Elysian
body: Elysian is a Typescript/HTML5 canvas game engine that I created, I used my other project Wildcat to help inform and test decisions along the way. There is still work I am putting into Elysian, overhauling the API and adding some missing features. Elysian is bundled using webpack and is made in Typescript which is immensely helpful for building a complex system like a game engine.

title: This Portfolio Site
body: At work and in past personal projects I defaulted to using AngularJS for creating websites, seeing how cool React + React Native could be I was always curious, once React went full MIT, I decided to build a portfolio website to test it out. This is that site! All of my css is custom and written using BEM syntax styling.

title: Can Periwinkle Even
body: An Object-Oriented RPG made in 4 weeks from the ground up using java. This was a project done in my last semester of school along side 5 other students, we worked together to create a game from scratch using Java as part of an assignment. We did all of the work within the time-frame of about a month and were extremely proud of the results that we were able to achieve!

title: Pseudo Fullscreen
body: This is a chrome extension I made. When I first saw ultra-wide monitors in the stores I knew immediately they were what was missing from my life. After my second college internship I built a computer and bought an ultrawide monitor. I was always annoyed by the wasted side space in 16:9 aspect videos so I created an chrome extension that would fullscreen video within the browers to a 16:9 ratio and leave you with space to do other things!
